item.description:
Our charter meeting has been set for September 26th 7:00-8:30 PM at The Boston Conservatory. A big thanks to Erin Huelskamp for arranging the use of the Seully Hall located on the 4th floor.

1. Introductions and tell a bit about ourselves and topics that interest us for this and future meetings.

2. Share ideas of how the Nonprofit Connector Group can be formatted to be of greatest value to most participants.

3. Erin Huelskamp will speak about "Juventas" a nonprofit startup she has initiated.

4. Announcements, opportunities, connections.

5.. Exchange business cards/social networking.
item.name: Nonprofit Connector Group: Inaugural Meetup
